title: Steven Spielberg defends his superhero movie comments
text:
Steven Spielberg defends his superhero movie comments 
Published By: TotalFilm.com - Today 
Steven Spielberg has clarified his comments on superhero movies, claiming he did not predict the collapse of the genre
